titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Members of the Committee on the Judiciary in Monte Lee V. Joseph R. Biden, Jr., et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Members of the Committee on the Judiciary in the case of Monte Lee v. Joseph R. Biden, Jr., et al.
